Description.val: Mortar Systems includes the production of M224/A1, 60mm; M252/A1, 81mm; and M120/M121, 120mm Mortar Weapon Systems and includes production of associated equipment to include procurement of the M326 Mortar Stowage Kit and M1101 trailer that are used with the M120 120mm towed mortar system.  The Mortar Stowage Kit system enables rapid emplacement and displacement of the M120 from the M1101 Trailer.

Justification.val:
FY2013 Base procurement funding, $8.104 million, procures 410 60mm Direct Lay Sight (DLS), 48 M1101 Trailers and 650 Round Counter along with production support cost for production, staging, and new equipment training.  These systems support requirements for lightweight 60mm mortars for Infantry and Stryker Brigade Combat team and Special Forces.

"In accordance with Section 1815 of the FY 2008 National defense Authorization Act (P.L. 110-81), this item is necessary for use by the active and reserve components of the Armed Forces for homeland defense missions, domestic emergency responses, and providing military support to civil authorities."
